testcase.name: Create a facility and cross verify the detail entered
To verify validations on add facility screen
Verify the company ID displayed in add facility screen
Verify that by default 'All' is selected in members assigned
Edit an existing facility from facility list screen and cross verify the modification
Edit an existing facility from facility detail screen and cross verify the modification
Deactivate and Activate facility from facility list screen
Verify that the user is able to select multiple users in ‘Members Assigned’ dropdown
Verify that the same name facility is not added twice in the same company

testcase.name: Filter the facility list upon selecting status
User should be able to search when he enters the keyword and clicks on 'Filter' button
User should be able to search when he enters the keyword and hits ‘Enter’ button on keyboard
